title: 94/21/EC: Commission Decision of 13 January 1994 amending the Seventh Council Decision 85/355/EEC on the equivalence of field inspections carried out in third countries on seed-producing crops and the Seventh Council Decision 85/356/EEC on the equivalence of seed produced in third countries
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 13 January 1994 amending the Seventh Council Decision 85/355/EEC on the equivalence of field inspections carried out in third countries on seed-producing crops and the Seventh Council Decision 85/356/EEC on the equivalence  of seed produced in third countries (94/21/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The table in Part I (2) of the Annex to Decision 85/355/EEC is hereby amended by inserting in Column 3 of the section relating to New Zealand the species 'Festuca pratensis Hudson' after the species 'Festuca arundinacea'.

The table in Part I (2) of the Annex to Decision 85/356/EEC is hereby amended by inserting in Column 3 of the section relating to New Zealand the species 'Festuca pratensis Hudson' after the species 'Festuca arundinacea'.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 January 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
